venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
**UPDATE: Meet outside The Wild Rover at 8:20pm so we can all go in together. I'm blonde and will be wearing a short black coat with fur on the hood and black over-the-knee boots, so come on up and introduce yourself!

We are on the list for front-of-the-line/no cover under "BOSTON CITY GIRLS", so if you miss the group and they try to charge you a cover mention this and they should let you in.

Pleeeeeease try to be on time though!  Sorry for the "mommy" tone; it's just that depending on how busy the place is, it could be tough to find the group once we go inside, and i know from experience that it sucks to be the one wandering around alone trying to find everyone. :) Of course, it could be totally empty in there and not hard to spot the group at all--who knows.  LOL.

See you tonight!  Hope you all have your best karaoke songs ready to perform!

<3 Brie

 

 

 

Karaoke, Dancing, and $1 beers! Add to that St. Patrick's Day and I think this will be an awesome time. We could always meet up somewhere else and all go in together since this place gets pretty packed.
item.name: Karaoke and Dancing!
